original_text: But the Spirit of the Lord clothed Gideon, and he sounded the trumpet, and the Abiezrites were called out to follow him.
korean_text: 여호와의 영이 기드온에게 임하시니 기드온이 나팔을 불매 아비에셀이 그의 뒤를 따라 부름을 받으니라

sentences.original_text: But the Spirit of the Lord clothed Gideon
and the Abiezrites were called out to follow him.
sentences.korean_translation: 아비에셀 사람들이 그를 따르라고 불려 나왔습니다.
